definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Action figures and games & puzzles saw increases of four per cent and one per cent.
sentences.chinese: 動畫人物和遊戲及拼圖看到了百分之百分之一4增加。

sentences.english: Do the voice actors ever visit the studio to see the animation process?

sentences.english: He hates cartoons, so every time he sees them he .
sentences.chinese: 他討厭動畫片，所以每次看見了他都轉檯。

sentences.english: No animation or skinning is imported.
sentences.chinese: 沒有動畫或蒙皮被導入。

sentences.english: You can also combine multiple transformation animations in the same element.
sentences.chinese: 還可以在同一個元素中組合多個轉換動畫。

sentences.english: Stopping an animation also Rewinds it to the Start.
sentences.chinese: 停止一個動畫會讓動畫重回開始位置。

sentences.english: This paper mainly introduces the design and application of computer animation in teaching film.
sentences.chinese: 主要介紹計算機動畫在教學片中的設計和應用。

sentences.english: Don't see the cartoon yet, Bo-Bo.
What other animation studios does Aardman take notice of?
sentences.chinese: 阿德曼工作室都關注哪些其他的動畫工作室呢？

sentences.english: I can provide additional animation layers and videos to have this done.
sentences.chinese: 我可以提供額外的層和動畫影片有此完成。

sentences.english: The official mobile game of DreamWorks Animations' How To Train Your Dragon.
sentences.chinese: 夢工廠動畫製作的官方手機遊戲“馴龍高手”。

sentences.english: The third part of "The Cartoon of Kids of Family" is almost the same as the real-life version.
sentences.chinese: 《家有兒女動畫版》第三部劇情基本跟真人版一致。
